name: Curse of the Nine Treasures
description:
There's a small island, twenty days north and thirty days east of Parter Town, in the heart of the ocean itself. An island inhabited by monstrous creatures. Buried within are nine unique treasures, however, there is a catch: Due to a millenia-old curse, if one were to take one of these treasures, it would permanently lock away all the rest.

Not that some silly old curse is going to stop Captain Hookbeard.

Collect items, solve problems, and talk to some... Unique individuals, to collect one of the nine treasures, then reset time to try something different!

DISCLAIMER: This is a game made by my brother, uploaded with his permission.
